commentBody: Very powerful video on a very upsetting issue. All forms of online harassment are unacceptable, but what makes this particularly pernicious for women is that while men also receive threatening comments on these forums, the men in these jobs are unlikely to get seriously assaulted or killed in their lifetimes. The same isn't true for women. 1 in 4 American women is a victim of sexual violence, so a threat laced with sexual menace doesn't simply feel like a cruel comment. It feels imminent.
